cast.overview: The mostly true story of the legendary "worst director of all time", who, with the help of his strange friends, filmed countless B-movies without ever becoming famous or successful.
cast.title: Ed Wood

details.biography: Daniel Riordan (born July 12, 1958) is an American actor, perhaps best known for providing the voice of Alduin, the main antagonist of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. He has also voice acted for dozens of other video games and appeared in guest roles on numerous television shows. His most prominent live-action film role was as Turbo Man in Jingle All the Way (1996).
details.name: Daniel Riordan
